description: A government study found 64% of vehicles breaking St Marks' 30mph limit.
title: Study finds 64% of vehicles speeding in St Marks
title_page: Study finds 64% of vehicles speeding in St Marks - BBC News
maintext: A spokesman for Malew Commissioners, which looks after St Marks, said "the island's unique view on speed limits has value" but "where speed limits are in force then they should be adhered to".
